text: The Screen Award for Best Cinematography is a technical award of The Screen Awards, (previously named Star Screen Awards), an annual awards ceremony held in India honouring professional excellence in the Bollywood Film Industry.Star Screen Awards, Indian Express retrieved 4 Nov 2016Screen Awards, Best Cinematography, 2015, Indian Express retrieved 4 Nov 2016 The nomination and award selection is done by a panel of distinguished professionals from the industry.
